paragraphs.body: Heisler got his start in the industry in the late 1980s as a letterer, primarily for Marvel Comics. From there, he moved into writing and editing, serving as an editor for the revival of the monster movie magazine Famous Monsters in Filmland. Heisler also wrote the Gen¹³ mini-series Gen¹³: Interactive and the one-shot Gen¹³: The Surreal World.
